name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouKan -  Your Simple Kanban New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouKan organize, so let’s get it done!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine opening a new tab in your Chrome browser and being greeted by a clean, minimalistic workspace designed to boost your productivity. YouKan transforms your new tab into a powerful yet simple Kanban board, helping you effortlessly manage your tasks and stay organized throughout your day.

Key Features

Effortless Task Management: Quickly add tasks to your board and keep your workflow seamless. Whether it's work deadlines or personal projects, YouKan makes it easy to track what needs to be done.

Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Functionality: Move tasks between categories with a simple drag and drop. Easily organize your tasks into ToDo, Doing, or Done—it’s as straightforward as it sounds!

Delete and Collapse for Cleanliness: Once a task is completed, delete it with a click or collapse the Done section to declutter your workspace. YouKan keeps your board neat and focused on what truly matters.

Dark Mode and Light Mode: Personalize your experience with the choice of dark mode for those late-night work sessions or light mode for a refreshing daytime feel. Switch modes to match your mood and environment.

Edit Your Tasks: Got a typo in your newly added task? Just drag it onto the edit icon and edit it.

Backup Your Tasks: Never worry about losing your hard work! YouKan allows you to back up your tasks to a JSON file, ensuring that your progress is always safe and retrievable.

Restore Tasks with Ease: Easily restore your tasks from the JSON file whenever you need to get back to where you left off, making it simple to pick up right where you left off.

Delete Tasks with Ease: Streamline your workflow by deleting tasks you no longer need, helping you focus on what’s essential and avoiding clutter.

With YouKan, managing your tasks has never been easier or more enjoyable. Experience the simplicity and efficiency of a Kanban board right in your browser’s new tab. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to productivity!
